description:
Do you like pancakes? Enjoy their taste? Do you want to make them yourself? 

Well... why not give it a try? Let's make one right away! 

Scoop up some pancake batter and drizzle it on a frying pan. Watch as it turns golden brown. 

Add some ingredients â€“ syrup, fruit, whipping cream... Don't forget a thing! 

When you get everything ready... serve! 

That's it!

Features:

* More than 40 dishes to serve 
* 3 unique locations
* More than 60 levels to explore
* Countless upgrades
* Unlock new items to upgrade your kitchen appliances, interiors and ingredients
* 50+ achievements to gain
name: Pancake Bar Tycoon
